name: Thriva Ltd
description: Provider of preventative healthcare services intended to empower people to proactively manage their health. The company's services offer subscription-based insights to monitor and track cholesterol levels, vitamin-D deficiency, iron deficiency, and poor liver function, enabling customers to access affordable, clinical-grade information that reveals how their lifestyle is impacting their well-being.
one_liner: Provider of preventative healthcare services intended to empower people to proactively manage their health. The company's services offer subscription-based insights to monitor and track cholesterol levels, vitamin-D deficiency, iron deficiency, and poor liver function, enabling customers to access affordable, clinical-grade information that reveals how their lifestyle is impacting their well-being.
